DialogueOption.Text: I learnt something cool about ghost matter, Arkose!
Hey, Arkose, is there actually a reason you keep chucking rocks into the ghost matter?

Dialogue.Page: Huh?.. <Pause>(pant)<Pause> Yeah, duh!
Oof, my arm’s tired from throwing...
But yeah! I’m just trying to find out why the ghost matter goes away sometimes!

DialogueOption.Text: Sorry, what? Ghost matter.. goes away sometimes?

Dialogue.Page: Yeah, I know right?! It's weird!
You know how there’s a green glowy trail when you throw something into a patch of ghost matter?
When I throw rocks into the patch of ghost matter, sometimes, it doesn’t leave a trail at all.
I dunno what causes it! It doesn’t happen every time, even when I throw harder, or use different kinds of rocks.
I asked Gabbro about it last time they came back from Giant's Deep. They told me yeah, ghost matter just goes away sometimes! They weren’t sure why, though.
It’s dangerous to get too close to the ghost matter, so I’m using these rocks to see if I can figure it out on my own.

DialogueOption.Text: Huh. Maybe I'll go check in with Gabbro to learn what they know about that, then.

Dialogue.Page: Oh! If you find anything about ghost matter out there, come back and tell me too, astronaut!
I wanna know all about ghost matter, so I'll be totally ready when I become an astronaut someday!
Something cool? Tell me, tell me!

DialogueOption.Text: Ghost matter killed the Noma-Iiii shouldn't be telling you this, never mind.
Ghost matter becomes safe as long as it's submerged underwater.
Uhh.. Nevermind. I'll tell you about it when I get back from space!

Dialogue.Page: Wait, huh..? Did the Nomai.. get hurt because of ghost matter..?

DialogueOption.Text: Nononono, they just.. left because there was ghost matter all over the star system and it was too dangerous to stay around!

Dialogue.Page: Woah.. Is that true?
The Nomai must have been really, really smart to figure that out and leave the star system! I hope they're doing okay, wherever they are.
Hey, we should send a message to tell them that the star system's mostly safe now!
Then they could move back here, and we could talk and eat mallows around the campfire together!
Woah.. <Pause> Is that what's making the ghost matter here disappear?
But.. There's not much water around here. The geyser isn't spraying enough, and it hasn't rained at all lately.
But still, that's really cool!
I'm gonna ask Slate to build me a suit of water later, so I can do snow angels in the ghost matter...
Huh?! Really?!
Ohh, so that's why the ghost matter goes away sometimes.. It must be the Attlerock's gravity pulling this patch here up when it's coming over the village!
I know that part 'cos of the cool orb exhibit in the museum!
I was so focused I never even noticed the Attlerock coming over the village every time it disappeared..
Thanks a bunch for telling me, astronaut! Now, I can finally stop throwing rocks and rest my arm...
Aw.. Okay..
Hey, astronaut... Since ghost matter obeys gravity...
If somebody, um... borrowed the gravity crystal from the museum and pointed it near the ghost matter... Could I order the ghost matter to go anywhere I wanted?
Oooh, I can't wait! I'm gonna be able to shoot ghost matter at any mean bugs that fly at me from now on... Mwahahaha...
